title: Optimize CypherSafe for Desktop with Responsive Layout and Keyboard Shortcuts

requirements.text: Implement responsive side-by-side layout for screens wider than 1024px: left panel displays the notes list, right panel displays the full-screen editor (focus mode)

quotes: When the screen width is larger than 1024px (PC mode), expand the dashboard into a Side-by-Side Layout. Left Panel: List of your secure notes. Right Panel: The Full-Screen Editor (Focus Mode).

acceptanceCriteria: On screens wider than 1024px, NotesApp.tsx displays a two-column layout
Left column shows the NotesList component
Right column shows the FullScreenEditorOverlay component embedded inline (not as an overlay)
Layout remains stacked/single-column on screens 1024px or narrower

requirements.text: Add keyboard shortcut Ctrl+N to create a new note

quotes: Ctrl + N to create a New Crypt.

acceptanceCriteria: Pressing Ctrl+N anywhere in the app triggers note creation
Shortcut opens the full-screen editor for a new note
Shortcut only activates when user is authenticated

requirements.text: Add keyboard shortcut Ctrl+S to save the current note
acceptanceCriteria: Pressing Ctrl+S while editing a note triggers the save mutation
Default browser save behavior is prevented
Visual feedback confirms save action

requirements.text: Add keyboard shortcut Esc to exit focus mode editor
acceptanceCriteria: Pressing Esc closes the full-screen editor overlay
On desktop (>1024px), Esc clears the selected note and returns to notes list only
Shortcut only works when editor is active

requirements.text: Display a golden notification prompting desktop users to install CypherSafe with the message: 'Install CypherSafe on your Desktop for a larger writing canvas.'

quotes: If the user is on a Desktop browser, show a small golden notification: 'Install CypherSafe on your Desktop for a larger writing canvas.'

acceptanceCriteria: Notification appears only on desktop browsers (screen width >1024px)
Notification has a golden/amber visual theme
Notification is dismissible and does not reappear after dismissal
Notification prompts PWA install if supported by browser

requirements.text: Verify that notes saved on mobile via ICP blockchain are instantly visible on the PC version using the same Internet Identity login

quotes: Ensure that notes saved on the mobile via ICP Blockchain are instantly visible on the PC version using the same login/key.

acceptanceCriteria: Notes created or updated on one device appear immediately when refreshed on another device
Same Internet Identity principal accesses identical note data on all devices
No device-specific state isolation exists in the backend
React Query cache invalidation ensures fresh data after mutations

constraints: Do not modify backend authentication or note storage logic
Preserve existing mobile-first responsive design for screens â‰¤1024px
Keep Internet Identity as the sole authentication mechanism
Maintain existing note encryption and self-destruct features
nonGoals: Additional authentication methods beyond Internet Identity
Backend changes to note schema or storage architecture
